name: Uncooked
description:
How To Play

Use the axe on trees and pickaxe on rocks to get wood and stone. Place the wood and stone on the train to craft rails. Connect rails to the existing track to keep the train going as long as you can. The bucket is used to keep the boiler car from emptying. If it empties, train will ignite.

Controls

  • WASD to Move
  • Left Click to Interact
  • Left Shift to Dash

Info

The main gameplay elements of Unrailed! are functional, with many bugs I don't know of I'm sure.

As for the Overcooked part, I'm currently working on systems to acquire and cook ingredients to sell for coins.

The last feature I'll add before being out of Beta will be local-multiplayer.

Anyone who notices any bugs, or would like to help with the development of the game (like the art and music), let me know in the comments.
